pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, May 23, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

9:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate virtually in a Q&A discussion with the Prime Minister of Barbados Mia Mottley and Bill Nye as part of Global Citizen NOW.

Note for media:

  • The event will premiere on Wednesday, May 25, via the following link: https://www.youtube.com/globalcitizen

Kamloops, British Columbia

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Tk’emlúps te Secwépemc Kúkpi7 (Chief) Rosanne Casimir and Council members and attend the Tk’emlúps te Secwépemc Le Estcwicwéy̓ (The Missing) memorial. A brief media availability will follow.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
